SEARCH
Package app

Class ParadeApp

java.lang.Object
app.ParadeApp
public class ParadeApp extends Object
ParadeApp is the main entry point of the application. It controls the console interface and initializes the game based on user preferences. It works closely with GameController, MultiplayerController, and SinglePlayerController to manage different game modes. The class handles: 1. Loading game configurations from properties file 2. Displaying welcome messages and game rules 3. Managing user input for game setup 4. Initializing appropriate game controllers based on user choices

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Main entry point of the application. Initializes the game and handles the main game flow.
      Parameters:
      args - Command line arguments (not used)

    • loadProperties

      public static void loadProperties() throws IOException
      Loads game configurations from the config.properties file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there is an error reading the properties file

    • askForRules

      public static void askForRules()
      Asks the user if they understand the game rules. If not, provides a URL to the rulebook.

    • getNumberOfPlayers

      public static int getNumberOfPlayers()
      Prompts the user to enter the number of human players for the game.
      Returns:
      The number of human players (between MIN_PLAYERS and MAX_PLAYERS)

    • getNumberOfAIs

      public static int getNumberOfAIs(int minimum, int numberOfHumanPlayers)
      Prompts the user to enter the number of AI players for the game.
      Parameters:
      minimum - Minimum number of AI players required
      numberOfHumanPlayers - Number of human players already in the game
      Returns:
      The number of AI players to add

    • getUserOwnName

      public static String getUserOwnName()
      Prompts the user to enter their username.
      Returns:
      The validated username entered by the user

    • getIPAddress

      public static String getIPAddress()
      Prompts the user to enter the server's IP address when joining a game.
      Returns:
      The validated IP address or "localhost"

    • getPortNumber

      public static int getPortNumber()
      Prompts the user to enter the server's port number when joining a game.
      Returns:
      The validated port number (0-65535)

    • askForBlackjack

      public static boolean askForBlackjack()
      Prompts the user to choose whether to play with blackjack rules.
      Returns:
      true if blackjack rules are enabled, false otherwise
